info.title: Planned Independent Requirement
info.description: The PIRs are read, updated, and/or created on header and item level. You can also send batch requests. Use this API if you want to work with the Change PIR or Maintain PIR apps.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read, create, and update planned independent requirements (PIRs) for your demand forecast planning

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a Planned Independent Requirement with all the respective header attributes.

get.summary: Reads a Planned Independent Requirement Header by its key.
get.description: Reads a Planned Independent Requirement Header by its key fields material, plant, MRParea, requirement type, version, plan, segment.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Update the active indicator for a Planned Independent Requirement.

get.summary: Reads Items of a Planned Independent Requirement.
get.description: Retrieves all items of a single Planned Independent Requirement.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Add Items to a Planned Independent Requirement.
post.description: Add or update items of a single Planned Independent Requirement.

get.description: Retrieves information about periods created for some Planned Independent Requirement.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates a Planned Independent Requirement Item.
post.description: Creates a Planned Independent Requirement Item with a quantity.

get.summary: Reads a single Planned Independent Requirement Items by its key.
get.description: Retrieves a single Planned Independent Requirement Item by its key fields (Planned Independent Requirement key and period).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates a Planned Independent Requirement Item.
patch.description: Update the quantity for a Planned Independent Requirement Item.

get.summary: Reads Header Info of Planned Independent Requirement Items.
get.description: Retrieves the header info of a Planned Independent Requirement Item.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET PlannedIndepRqmt HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
